attributes.action: Govt to pay 75% of all earnings lost as a result of Covid -19 immediately.
attributes.additional_details: The mental stress imposed on all people will be intolerable if action is not taken
attributes.background: We want the government to help all those people laid off as a result of Covid 19 outbreak including the self employed

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

The Government has said that most self-employed people can claim a taxable grant worth 80% of their trading profits up to a maximum of £2,500 per month for the next 3 months.

You can find out who is eligible and how to apply here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/claim-a-grant-through-the-coronavirus-covid-19-self-employment-income-support-scheme

You can read the Government's announcement here: 
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals 

You can find out about what other Government support is available for people as a result of coronavirus (under the section on employment and financial support) here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
